name: Rubidium nitrate
desc: Rubidium nitrate is an inorganic compound with the formula RbNO3. This alkali metal nitrate salt is white and highly soluble in water.
Other cations:
Lithium nitrate
Sodium nitrate
Potassium nitrate
Caesium nitrate
standard state:
Except where otherwise noted, data are given for materials in their standard state (at 25 °C [77 °F], 100 kPa).
